branchCategory.name: Remote
branchCategory.description: <p>Sensors to be installed out of view, with analog outputs for a sensor monitor or the HMI.</p>

branchItem.name: PSE560, Remote Analog Pressure Sensor, General Purpose, IP65
branchItem.description: <p>PSE560 and 564 are remote pressure sensors with an analog V or mA signal output.  PSE56* sensors measure pressure of any liquid or gas non-corrosive to 316L stainless steel.  560 is for a standard pneumatic system's pressure range, while the 564 model is for low pressure.  An accuracy of <span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">±1% of the full scale rated pressure range is suitable for general purpose applications.  Includes a fixed cable with field wired connector option.  PSE560 and PSE564 are UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with IP65 enclosure ratings.</span></p>

branchItem.name: PSE570, Remote Analog Pressure Sensor, Enhanced, IP65
branchItem.description: <p>PSE570 remote pressure sensors offer positive pressure ranges from 500 kPa to 10 MPa, with increased proof pressures and a higher withstand voltage for improved durability in unpredictable conditions.  A nickel-plated C3604 brass port and ceramic sensor impart compatibility with a wide range of liquids and gases.  An analog V or mA signal ouput is transmitted over a cable with an M12 connector.  Accuracy is <span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">±1% full scale for pressure below 1 MPa and </span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">±2.5% for higher ranges. PSE570 sensors are CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP65 enclosure rating.</span></p>

branchItem.name: PSE300, Pressure Sensor Monitor, 1 Screen, Switch and Analog Outputs
branchItem.description: <p>PSE300 is a pressure sensor monitor with a 3 + 1/2 digit, 2 color display.  This monitor pairs with any PSE sensor, adding functionality similar to an ISE sensor with integrated display.  Instantaneous readings are shown in red or green, or shifted from one to the other to alert reaching a target condition. Two available switch outputs are also indicated with LEDs.  Other functions permit calibration, peak/bottom readings, error indications, key lock, and anti-chatter.  PSE300 models are UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p> <p><span style="color: #ff0000;">The PSE300 legacy sensor monitor has been updated.  Please consider the new PSE300AC.  Improved features include a new 3-screen, 3-color display, front facing M12 connections, selectable NPN/PNP outputs, and an IP65 enclosure rating.</span></p>

branchItem.name: PSE300AC, Pressure Sensor Monitor, 3 Screen, 2 Outputs, IP65
branchItem.description: <p>PSE300AC is a remote sensor monitor with an informative, easy to read 3 screen 3 color display.  While primarily suited for the PSE570 pressure sensor series, its range input function scales the analog output of any sensor with M12 connector.  View the sensor's measured value on the main screen, while also viewing a variety of secondary data on the sub-screens.  Upgraded features include front facing M12 power and sensor connections, low energy consumption, and selectable NPN/PNP outputs.  PSE300AC is CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP65 enclosure rating.</p>

branchItem.name: PSE200, Multi-Channel Pressure Sensor Monitor, 1 Screen, 5 Outputs
branchItem.description: <p>PSE200 is a pressure sensor monitor with a 4 digit, 1 color display able to manage up to 4 PSE sensors.  The value of any sensor can be selected for display, with an LED indicator showing the channel chosen.  Switch outputs with LED indicators are available for each channel, with 2 outputs for channel 1.  Multiple functions are availabe to optimize the display, switch set points, and security.  PSE200 is CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP65 front face rating when panel mounted.</p>

branchItem.name: PSE200/300, Power Supply/Output Connection Cable
branchItem.description: <p>Power supply connection cable for series PSE200/300 pressure sensor controllers.</p>
